title: Graviola: a soft and friendly sans
content:
Ahoy!

I'd like to introduce you my new type foundry, Harbor Type, and my first commercial release, Graviola.

Enjoy 70% off until December 15th.

Get it directly from us at [http://www.harbortype.com/graviola/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042411/http:/www.harbortype.com/graviola/)  
Webfonts are available from our resellers ( [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042411/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/harbor-type/graviola/), [Fontspring](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042411/http:/www.fontspring.com/fonts/harbortype/graviola) and [YWFT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042411/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/font/T5415/graviola)).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042411im_/http:/typophile.com/files/graviola_01_cover_4318.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042411im_/http:/typophile.com/files/graviola_02_3518.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042411im_/http:/typophile.com/files/graviola_04_5638.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042411im_/http:/typophile.com/files/graviola_06_6741.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322042411im_/http:/typophile.com/files/graviola_14_4973.png)
author: hbeier

comments.content: Looks nice. I like you "G". Good luck with it.
Very nice typeface. The 'G' is very cool.
